name: It looks familiar
description:
As you tried to build a time machine, you ended up accidentally traveling to an alternate universe. Because your technology is new, your ship broke and you have to fix it, in order to get back home. Find resources and discover their properties to repair your ship and continue your journey.

Controls:

WASD  - Movement

E - Toggle Inventory

Space - Toggle Repair Console (When near your ship)

Left Mouse - Drag Drop items into the repair console

Right Mouse - Remove items
